issue.title: [GLib] Add support for QuantileOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16623](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16623). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
No options available for quantile in Ruby. It requires GLib implementation.

comments.body:
